title: Baked neeps and tatties
ingredients: ['1.6L chicken stock', '1.4kg floury potatoes, peeled and cubed', '700g swede, peeled and cubed', '600g parsnips, peeled and cubed', '8 cloves garlic', '1 bay leaf', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '175g butter, softened', '3 onions, thinly sliced', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
